creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Publish a page to live, then try to view it. 

Caused by: org.apache.cocoon.sitemap.PatternException: Error while evaluating
'context:/lenya/pubs/{page-envelope:publication-id}/{global:cache-dir}/{../../1}/{../../2}.html'
: not so many levels
        at
org.apache.cocoon.components.treeprocessor.variables.PreparedVariableResolver.processVariable(PreparedVariableResolver.java:317)
